(:action create
    :parameters (?npc - agent ?location - place ?creation - object ?materials - object)
    :precondition (and
                    (at ?npc ?location)
                    (has-materials ?npc ?materials)
                    (location-type ?location beach))
    :effect (and
              (created ?creation)
              (not (has-materials ?npc ?materials))

(:action put ; Place an item into a container
  :parameters (?a - agent ?i - item ?c - container)
  
  :precondition (and 
                  (holding ?a ?i)
                  (available ?c)
                  (not (in ?i ?c))
                )
  
  :effect (and 
            (not (holding ?a ?i))
